Articles.Content: Anyone here know of or are interested in making some Kerbal Space Program Creepypasta? All I know is "Jebediah's Vision," but if you ask me, I think KSP has tons of fuel (NPI) for some good old fashioned nightmare fuel. It IS space after all.
Search "KSP creepypasta" and about the second result is from the forum... my jimmies have been russled.
Wow. Just wow. That's kinda cool and kinda scary at the same time.

Dunno if we're allowed to link to the creepypasta wiki.

Just google KSP creepypasta.
I do wonder if there are any other than Jeb's Vision.
There are, as explained in my post.
